name: Einfach Mel
description:
Einfach Mel is a german word-puzzle jump and run game. Developed for kids, in communication with german primary school teachers, for learning how words are builded. For making this more fun you can discover the world by jumping around and collect some butterflies.

Story: Mel is a little girl who is bored by her way to school. Often she dreams about having it more spectacular.

CONTROLLS

Use A and D for moving.
Jump with Space.
Use W and S for watching up and down.
Use Esc for menu.
Use WASD for movin in options and menu.
